p: B.H. and L.H.L conceived, designed and coordinated the study. L.H.L. wrote the Poseidon code and scripts for querying the NSB and TARA Oceans databases. K.A.H. and D.D. performed CCM analysis. T.R. performed SDE analysis. B.H. carried out the Poseidon simulations, taxonomic remapping, IT analysis and all additional analyses, and drafted the manuscript. All authors discussed results and interpretations, commented on drafts of the manuscript and gave final approval for publication.
